stepId.description: The unique identifier of the step being completed.

result.description: The result, answer, or summary for the step.

cannotFinish.description: Indicates the LLM/agent cannot finish the step.

reason.description: Explanation if the step cannot be finished or an error occurred.

timestamp.description: When the step was marked as completed (ISO 8601).

nextStepSuggestion.description: Suggestion for what to do next if the step cannot be finished.
